text: Erdem Şen (born 5 January 1989, in Brussels, Belgium) is a Belgian professional footballer of Turkish descent who most recently played as a midfielder for İstanbulspor. ==Career== On 18 August 2016, Erdem Şen signed with Marítimo. ==References== ==External links== *Profile on Thefinalball.co.uk * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Turkish footballers Category:Belgian people of Turkish descent Category:Giresunspor footballers Category:Samsunspor footballers Category:Gaziantepspor footballers Category:C.S. title: Erdem Şen
